thread.title: BRIEF-Aures Technologies refreshes point-of-sale hardware for Radley
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Aures Technologies refreshes point-of-sale hardware for Radley | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Aures Technologies refreshes point-of-sale hardware for Radley
text:
Sept 3 Aures Technologies Sa :
* Announced on Aug. 13 that it was commissioned by fashion accessories retailer Radley to refresh point-of-sale hardware across its store estate
* New Sango touchscreen terminals and linked Aures ODP 333 thermal printers are being installed within the contract Source text: bit.ly/1KL9fwD Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
